title: Anyway to stop instalockers?
body: Im really fed up with this bs that people are doing, its annoying enough to see people instalock but when they totally ignore you can take your lane and lock even though you called it pisses the fuk out of me, Making me dodge the fukin queue everytime that happens. Its fukin annoying but they get no punishment for doing this crap. why couldnt there be some anti lock/ troll system because its getting really repetitive and makes  me want to quit every single FUKIN LOBBY

replies.body: Just play Teambuilder. Oh wait, Riot removed that from OCE. Thanks...

What i like to do is play their own game against them. I friend them play a couple games with them pick random champ then instalock on the same lane they are no matter if its jg, supp, mid i don't even care i just want them to feel the same pain i feel when they do it to me. of the the games I've played like this I've won about 30% of em (mostly due to luck or enemy AFKs).

If people instalock in the lane. 90% of the time they are good at the line. 
im THANKFUL we have instalockers, it means we will have a great game.

What im saying is let instalockers be and pick another lane man, they WILL be good at their lane or there would be no point in instalocking
no no no no no no no no god no....

from what ive read dodging frequently doesnt have long term punishments other than increasing dodge times in like 16 hour interval. otherwise you can play the game and report that person, unless they hard carried, srsly

It might sound stupid but using dodge tactics actually works. I have like 40% success rate with it, better than nothing I guess. Encase you don't know what dodge tactics are, [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IptHVXlP0zc) video should summarize it pretty well.

Usually the guy who calls it first gets it, but thats gentlemen rules. Short answer no, you have to be better then they are and roll over and let them have, it makes you a better all round player eventually.
